content: this pattern is for a rectangular version of the erigeneia 1 shawl this rectangular shape is my idea and an adaptation to the triangular original you can now make an erigeneia scarf rectangular stole or wrap the triangle-shaped erigeneia was designed by the very talented silke terhorst maschenzähler designs all copyright to the erigeneia pattern lays with silke silke gave me permission to write down the rectangular version the pattern contains options to vary width to scarf stole or wrap width the length can be made upon your own liking you start this pattern in one corner and end in the opposite corner no long beginning chain this pattern can be made with any yarn from lace to worsted from solid to variegated yarn you might even play with mohair or use different types of yarns together pattern is written and charted the chart in this pattern is also by silke isn t she the best please check out her other wonderful designs 2 german translation can be found on slikes blog here 3 **die deutsche übersetzung steht auf silkes blog 4 ** danke silke für die deutsche übersetzung with thanks to the testers of the rectangle pattern dreamsincrochet monvisocrochet melissajax rosenator spotnik charu ellel and the otherjenny also thanks to the csw group who are so great at stimulating to think how to acchieve any shawl in any shape a creative and supportive bunch of people 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/erigeneia 2 https //www ravelry com/designers/silke-terhorst 3 http //www maschenzaehler de/anleitungen/haekelanleitung-erigeneia-in-a-rectangle/ 4 http //www maschenzaehler de/anleitungen/haekelanleitung-erigeneia-in-a-rectangle/
